verbs.description: President Trump 's 2020 campaign manager [V: is] repeating his call for Jim Acosta 's press credentials to be suspended , saying CNN 's chief White House correspondent is " an absolute disgrace " for interrupting a signing ceremony during the summit between President Trump and North Korean Leader Kim Jong Un."Jim @Acosta should immediately have his press credentials suspended . He is an absolute disgrace ! " wrote Brad Parscale to his 100,000 Twitter ...
